titleStmt.title: A letter from a friend to a loyal subject where ever he is in England, Scotland, France or Ireland that is wise and faithful, valorous and couragious, for the great honour of God and our royal sovereign, Charles the Second, King of Great Britain / by J.V.
titleStmt.author: J. V., 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. James for the author,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
